title: Chloe Blooms
description: Every experience is a doorway to another opportunity, a chance to take hold of that secret part of our lives and run with them. "Gift of Flight" and "Chloe Blooms" open a special gateway into a world where the lines between pleasure and pain, dominance and submission, blur and give way to something amazing. Whether it's Amanda the neophyte stumbling onto the lifestyle, or Chloe, a seasoned veteran dominatrix seeking a fresh twist on her perspective, the BDSM playground offers a change neither woman expected to find.
author: C.L. Roberts-Huth
